CustomField.description: v2:US-0010560 - [SP - EU Deals] Allow sellers to edit specific deal fields post deal rejection
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(EBH_DealSiteId__c , '77'),ISPICKVAL(EBH_Status__c,'Rejected'),ISPICKVAL(EBH_BusinessName__r.SP_Deals__c,'Full Access')), CONTAINS('Preis zu hoch, Fehlende oder falsche Angaben, Angebotene Menge zu gering, Abverkaufspotenzial zu gering, Schlechte Bildqualit√§t, Falsche Kategorie', TEXT(EBH_ReasonforRejection__c)) , FALSE )
CustomField.label: Can Re-Submit
